title: Social Constructivism-Based Simulation Training for Inclusive Educational Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Training course where pre-service teachers practice inclusive lesson design reflecting diverse learner needs in VR environments, emphasizing knowledge construction through social interaction

learning_goals: Learners can execute an inclusive lesson design process applying social constructivist principles in VR simulations, divided into three or more stages
Learners develop and apply two personalized learning strategies in scenario-based projects collaborated with special education experts
Learners can design assessment rubrics based on learner characteristics using digital tools (AR/VR, AI analytics) in the Society 5.0 era
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
